author: Eurosport_FR
title: Montpellier respire un grand coup
text:
TOP 14 - Montpellier vient √† bout de Toulon (27-17) et respire un grand coup
Un grand bol d'air pour le MHR. Les Montpelli√©rains se sont montr√©s opportunistes face √† des Toulonnais trop impr√©cis pour glaner leur troisi√®me victoire de la saison en championnat (27-17). Montpellier reste lanterne rouge, mais recolle √† 4 points d'Oyonnax et du LOU, 12e et 13e. De son c√¥t√©, le RCT rate une belle occasion de monter sur le podium et reste cinqui√®me.
2024 ne pouvait pas mieux commencer pour Montpellier. La lanterne rouge du Top 14 a arrach√© au GGL Stadium sa troisi√®me victoire de la saison face √† Toulon (27-17), au terme d'un match brouillon mais volontaire. Devant au score toute la rencontre, les H√©raultais ont priv√© les Varois de solutions offensives gr√¢ce √† leur d√©fense intense, et marqu√© trois essais pour r√™ver un temps au bonus offensif. Avec ce succ√®s, le MHR revient √† 4 points du LOU, barragiste. Toulon reste 5e.

author: El Universal
title: Mr Black aparecer√° en serie de Disney Channel sobre champeta
text:
El artista cartagenero Mr Black incursionar√° en la televisi√≥n con su participaci√≥n en una serie de Disney Channel que tiene como eje central a la champeta.
El reconocido artista cartagenero Mr. Black est√° listo para conquistar un nuevo escenario, esta vez en las plataformas de streaming. El pr√≥ximo 3 de febrero se estrenar√° ‚ÄúChampeta, el ritmo de la tierra‚Äù en Disney Channel, una producci√≥n que busca resaltar la riqueza cultural de la champeta, g√©nero del cual es int√©rprete.
 Este proyecto representa un paso importante para la internacionalizaci√≥n de la champeta, llevando su energ√≠a y tradiciones a una audiencia mundial. En la serie, Mr. Black no solo tendr√° un rol actoral, sino que tambi√©n participar√° como compositor, productor e int√©rprete de la banda sonora oficial.
A trav√©s de su cuenta de Instagram, el artista comparti√≥ un adelanto que ha generado gran expectativa entre sus seguidores. El clip muestra fragmentos de las coloridas escenas de la serie, acompa√±adas por ritmos pegajosos que representan el alma de la champeta as√≠ como j√≥venes bailarines que encuentran en este g√©nero un motivo para disfrutar y compartir. Lea tambi√©n: El cantante argentino que regresar√° a Bucaramanga el pr√≥ximo 15 de mayo
La serie busca destacar historias que giran en torno a la identidad cultural y el talento de la regi√≥n Caribe, convirti√©ndose en un motivo de orgullo para Colombia. Este proyecto tambi√©n marca un nuevo cap√≠tulo en la carrera de Mr. Black, quien ha sido un embajador de la champeta durante a√±os.
La √∫ltima canci√≥n de Yuranis Le√≥n
Mr Black y Yuranis Le√≥n conforman una de las parejas m√°s estables de la far√°ndula local y nacional. Adem√°s de ser esposos, la pareja colabora en la carrera musical de ambos, destac√°ndose por apoyar al otro en los lanzamientos y la promoci√≥n de nuevas canciones.
‚ÄòEsa es la que te cae‚Äô fue el tema con el que Yuranis Le√≥n decidi√≥ cerrar el 2024, en un proyecto musical producido por el barranquillero ‚ÄòAstral‚Äô. ‚ÄúEsta nueva producci√≥n que logro lanzar se basa en esos hombres que viven alardeando lo que tienen, pero al momento de demostrar, no terminan teniendo ni haciendo nada. Son casos que suceden a diario, parte de la cotidianidad. El objetivo realmente es que se la disfruten al m√°ximo; se vale dedicarla, pero quiero aclarar que nada es personal‚Äù, expres√≥ Yuranis sobre la canci√≥n.

author: Luigi Kisselaro Tocchet
title: Nos p√™naltis, S√£o Paulo elimina o Fluminense e avan√ßa √†s quartas de final da Copinha
text:
S√£o Pauloenfrentou o
Fluminense, nesta quinta-feira, pelas oitavas de final da
Copinha. No Est√°dio Zezinho Magalh√£es, em Ja√∫, a partida terminou empatada em 0 a 0. Na disputa de p√™naltis, o Tricolor paulista venceu por 5 a 4 e garantiu vaga nas quartas de final.
Com o resultado, o S√£o Paulo avan√ßa para as quartas de final da competi√ß√£o e encara o
Cruzeiro,
que derrotou o Bahia por 3 a 0, ainda nesta quinta-feira. Por outro lado, o Fluminense se despede da Copa S√£o Paulo.
GOL! RYAN FRANCISCO MARCOU E O S√ÉO PAULO AVAN√áA √ÄS QUARTAS DE FINAL!
[#FLUxSPFC]
FLU: ‚öΩ‚öΩ‚ùå‚öΩ‚öΩ
SPFC: ‚öΩ‚öΩ‚öΩ‚öΩ‚öΩ[#MadeInCotia][#VamosS√£oPaulo]üáæüá™[pic.twitter.com/VeyEAonTyx]
‚Äî S√£o Paulo FC (@SaoPauloFC)[January 16, 2025]
Aos 29 minutos, o S√£o Paulo quase abriu o placar com Ryan Francisco, mas o gol foi anulado depois da arbitragem indicar que a bola tinha sa√≠do pela linha de fundo antes da finaliza√ß√£o. O Tricolor balan√ßou as redes mais uma vez, aos 38, mas o bandeirinha assinalou impedimento de Alves.
A segunda etapa seguiu muito equilibrada e nenhum time conseguiu inaugurar o marcador. Na disputa de p√™naltis, Paulinho, Maik, Hugo e Negrucci converteram para o S√£o Paulo. Enquanto Fabinho, L√©o Jance, Gorgulho e Keven Samuel fizeram para o Fluminense.
Ap√≥s o goleiro Jo√£o Pedro defender a cobran√ßa de J√∫lio Fidelis, Ryan Francisco bateu o p√™nalti decisivo e colocou o S√£o Paulo nas quartas de final.

author: Kinsey Crowley
title: Rogue wave injures 8 in Ventura, California: Video
text: Rogue wave in Ventura, California injures 8, coastal watches issued in California, Hawaii [Kinsey Crowley](https://www.usatoday.com/staff/12271400002/kinsey-crowley/) [Wes Woods II](https://www.vcstar.com/staff/6965156002/wes-woods-ii/) [Cheri Carlson](https://www.vcstar.com/staff/4406860002/cheri-carlson/) Videos out of [Ventura, California captured the moment a rogue wave](https://shorturl.at/eENOX) jumped over a seawall Thursday, sweeping aside the cars and people in its path. Ventura isn't the only place experiencing tumultuous coasts. The National Weather Service has issued surf and flooding advisories along the California coast and in Hawaii. A video from Ventura officials opens on a seemingly tranquil scene. People are scattered along the seawall, leaning against it and watching the rolling waves in the distance. Suddenly, people start to back away from the wall moments before a wave spikes up in front of them. As it crashes down into the street, many of the people running get their feet knocked out from under them and a truck seems to skip forward in the waves. Another angle captured by [Facebook user Colin Hoag shows the waves chasing him](https://www.facebook.com/1 103854833/videos/339998562146021/) down the street. Officials urged people to avoid the ocean. [High surf is expected](https://forecast.weather.gov/product.php?site=LOX&issuedby=LOX&product=AFD&format=ci&version=1&glossary=1) through Saturday. Rogue waves: [A rogue wave caused a cruise ship tragedy. They occur more often than you think.](/story/news/nation/2022/12/06/rogue-wave-explained/10828252002/) 8 people injured in Ventura, California due to rogue wave The Ventura County Fire Department was called to the scene of the wave shortly before 11 a.m. Thursday. "It ended up being a total of eight patients due to surf that came over the wall and flooded the streets," Ventura County Fire Capt. Brian McGrath said. The injured were taken to the nearby hospitals. Residents in the neighborhoods near the incident were advised to leave, said Cmdr. Ryan Weeks with the Ventura Police Department. The patrons of a nearby hotel were also asked to leave. Roads in and around those areas were also closed. California, Hawaii under coastal weather watch A National Weather Service meteorologist said a storm system over the Pacific is churning up swells. Here are the coastal weather warnings and watches issued by local NWS offices as a result of the storms: [NSW Los Angeles Office - "Dangerous Beach Conditions](https://www.weather.gov/lox/)" - Central Coast: 15-20 foot waves and potentially damaging coastal flooding - Ventura County Coast: 10-15 foot waves and potentially damaging coastal flooding - Santa Barbara South Coast and LA County Coast: 7-12 foot waves and moderate coastal flooding [NWS San Diego Office - "Marine and Coastal Hazards"](https://www.weather.gov/sgx/) - San Diego and Orange County - High surf warning with surf up to 15 feet through 2 a.m. Monday - Coastal flood advisory in effect for Orange County and San Diego County through 2 a.m. Monday [NWS San Francisco Office - All counties covered are under:](https://forecast.weather.gov/product.php?site=MTR&issuedby=MTR&product=SRF&format=CI&version=1&glossary=1&highlight=on) - Coastal flood advisory through 2 p.m. Friday - High surf advisory until 6 p.m. Friday Honolulu, [Hawaii](https://forecast.weather.gov/wwamap/wwatxtget.php?cwa=HFO&wwa=high%20surf%20warning) NWS Office - High surf warning is in effect until 6 a.m. local time Friday. Parts of the islands could see surf up to 35 feet - High surf advisory in effect for other parts of the islands until 6 p.m. Friday. Surfs could reach 15 to 20 feet.

author: Emma Riverola
title: "Aparta, monumento", un art√≠culo de Emma Riverola
text:
Emma Riverola
08 AGO 2024 23:06 Aparta, monumento El turismo se enfrenta a su miedo a morir de √©xito por la masificaci√≥n
Vecinos protestan contra la masificaci√≥n tur√≠stica en Alicante Pilar Cort√©s
Aqu√≠ estoy. Yo y la Sagrada Fam√≠lia (o la Casa Batll√≥ o la salamandra del Park G√ºell o el Pont del Bisbe ...). Ay, qu√© alta es. Voy a tener que sacrificar una parte. ¬øY esas dos vecinas? ¬øQu√© hacen? ¬°Se han parado! Est√°n hablando. ¬øPor qu√© hablan? Y esos carros de la compra horrorosos. Quiz√° puedo sombrearlos... ¬øY si los tapo con la mano? ¬°Eso es! Una sonrisa. Cara de entusiasmo. He quedado fant√°stica. La Sagrada Familia no se ve mucho, la verdad. Suficiente para dejar constancia de mi paso por Barcelona (o Sevilla o Mallorca o Tenerife‚Ä¶). La comparto. Ya llegan las primeras reacciones.
Prokopis Christou, investigador de din√°mica social y psicol√≥gica del turismo, public√≥ un estudio en 2020 en el que analizaba los selfis realizados por los turistas en Chipre. En el informe, denominaba efecto sombreado de la atracci√≥n al encuandre dominado por el rostro y los cuerpos del protagonista de la foto, mientras el espacio destinado a la atracci√≥n quedaba comparativamente insignificante. Ese tratamiento de la imagen marcaba una diferencia frente al pasado. El autor animaba a seguir investigando sobre la relaci√≥n entre destinos tur√≠sticos y narcisismo. Apuntaba, por ejemplo, a la utilizaci√≥n de lemas narcisistas para animar la demanda en aquellos lugares donde se requiriera. Por ejemplo, ¬´la cala m√°s hermosa y desconocida¬ª.
Otros art√≠culos de Emma Riverola tribuna
Galia y Andrea, hijas de los dioses Tribuna
Ni√±os de la guerra Tribuna
Esp√≠a que algo -o mucho- queda Es solo una capa m√°s de los m√∫ltiples sustratos del fen√≥meno tur√≠stico. Ese que vivimos de forma distinta si somos nosotros los que arrastramos una maleta o somos los que sufrimos un autob√∫s atestado para ir al trabajo. M√°s all√° de percepciones personales, es evidente que el turismo masivo afecta a los destinos y a las personas. Especialmente, cuando el turista se convierte en el centro de su propia mirada. Autorepresentaci√≥n, autoexposici√≥n, autopromoci√≥n‚Ä¶
El destino convertido en simple escenario y los vecinos, en extras o material sobrante. Distinguir el fen√≥meno no nos alumbra la soluci√≥n, pero quiz√° aporta alguna clave para regular o di versificar la oferta. (Y tambi√©n para conocernos un poco mejor).
TEMAS

author: Ansa
title: Donna sfregiata con acido, arrestata per calunnia a marito - Tiscali Notizie
text: (ANSA) - PALERMO, 28 DIC - Svolta a sorpresa nelle indagini sulla vicenda della donna che il 5 dicembre scorso aveva denunciato il marito accusandolo d'averle gettato addosso dell'acido nel tentativo di sfregiarla. La presunta vittima, che ha 50 anni, √® stata infatti arrestata. Nei suoi confronti i poliziotti della squadra mobile di Agrigento e del commissariato di Palma di Montechiaro hanno eseguito un'ordinanza di custodia cautelare in carcere con l'accusa di sfregio permanente e calunnia. Sarebbe lei, dunque, la responsabile dell'aggressione. Il marito, 48 anni, ricoverato al centro grandi ustioni dell'ospedale Cannizzaro di Catania con gravi ferite alle mani e al collo, era stato arrestato subito dopo il fatto con l'accusa di lesioni personali gravissime. La sua versione √® stata sempre opposta rispetto a quella fornita dalla moglie: "√à stata lei ad aggredirmi - aveva detto al gip -, quella bottiglietta con l'acido non l'ho neppure toccata". La donna, al contrario, aveva raccontato di essersi allontanata dalla casa protetta ad indirizzo segreto, dove era stata trasferita dopo avere denunciato presunte violenze da parte del coniuge, commettendo una leggerezza. Davanti agli inquirenti aveva sostenuto che doveva prendere dei vestiti e lo zainetto della figlia. In casa, sempre secondo la sua versione, avrebbe trovato il marito con una bottiglietta in mano contenente dell'acido che le avrebbe gettato sul viso. La donna se l'√® cavata con 20 giorni di prognosi. Il giorno dopo l'episodio, che aveva suscitato una grande eco sulla stampa, il procuratore di Agrigento Giovanni Di Leo aveva stigmatizzato "la diffusione incontrollata di notizie" invitando "alla massima cautela". "L'interesse pubblico su una simile vicenda, acuito da recenti, plurimi, gravissimi episodi di violenza di genere non pu√≤ e non deve scadere - aveva sottolineato il procuratore - nella morbosit√†, nel linciaggio mediatico o nella formazione e diffusione di voci e notizie incontrollate, a detrimento della serenit√† e completezza degli accertamenti, della genuinit√† degli atti, e soprattutto dei diritti alla riservatezza delle persone coinvolte e dell'indagato". (ANSA). .

author: Qatar Tribune
title: Met department issues warning of thundery rain, strong winds, and high seas - Read Qatar Tribune on the go for unrivalled news coverage
text:
DOHA: In its latest forecast, the Department of Meteorology has issued a cautionary advisory concerning the weather conditions expected on Friday. According to the department's daily report, there will be scattered clouds to partly cloudy skies inland, with a possibility of rain, potentially accompanied by thunderstorms in certain areas. Residents are advised to be prepared for thundery rain, which is expected to coincide with strong winds.
Offshore, similar weather patterns are anticipated, with scattered clouds to partly cloudy conditions during the day. However, the report warns that rain is likely to become thundery by nightfall, with strong winds and high seas expected. Mariners are urged to exercise caution, as the combination of thundery rain, strong winds, and high seas could pose risks to navigation.
Wind speeds inland are forecasted to range from northwesterly to northwesterly, blowing at speeds of 08 to 18 knots, with gusts reaching up to 30 knots during thundery rain showers. Offshore, wind conditions are expected to mirror those inland, with similar speeds and gusts anticipated.
Visibility both inland and offshore is predicted to be reduced during thundery rain showers, with visibility ranging from 4 to 8 kilometers, and potentially dropping to 3 kilometers or less inland, and 2 kilometers or less offshore.
Regarding sea conditions, inland areas can expect sea states ranging from 1 to 3 feet, surging to 5 feet during thundery rain showers. Offshore, sea states are forecasted to be more turbulent, with heights ranging from 3 to 5 feet, and surging up to 10 feet during thundery rain.
Residents and maritime interests are advised to stay updated on the latest weather forecasts and heed any official warnings or advisories issued by the authorities to ensure their safety and well-being amidst the anticipated adverse weather conditions.
 Copy 22/03/2024 70
